name: css-utils
description: CSS utility classes for Self Aware projects

scripts.build: sass --output-style compact --source-map dist/utils.css.map src/index.scss dist/utils.css; node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map dist/utils.min.css.map src/index.scss dist/utils.min.css;

author: Self Aware <howdy@selfaware.studio> (https://selfaware.studio)
